Dark_Blast.help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.targetHelp: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

Gather_Shadows.help: By collecting shadows from your surroundings you boost your damage and the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Gather Shadows last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You gather shadows around you to enhance your secondary effects and damage moderately.

Moonbeam.help: You release a burst of negative energy to foes around you dealing moderate Negative Energy damage, reducing their chance to hit and sapping their health over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Moonbeam.shortHelp: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)
Moonbeam.targetHelp: The Engulfing Darkness is causing minor Negative Energy over time and reducing your chance to hit!

Life_Drain.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Death_Shroud.help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Death_Shroud.targetHelp: The Moonbeam has reduced your chance to hit.

Midnight_Grasp.help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe, reduce their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.shortHelp: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Midnight_Grasp.targetHelp: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile. Your chance to hit is reduced.

Rending_Flurry.help: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Rending_Flurry.shortHelp: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

Blood_Craze.help: You go into a blood craze, making you quickly shrug aside some of the damage received. Blood Craze will immediately heal you for a small amount and cause you to heal for a moderate amount of health over a short time seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Blood_Craze.targetHelp: You are recovering health over time due to your Blood Thirst.
Blood_Craze.attackerHit: You take a moment to clear your head and recover from your wounds.

Call_Hawk.help: You call forth a hawk ally to swoop in and viciously peck at your target causing High Lethal damage. The attack often catches foes off their guard and can knock them down as well as reducing their chance to hit. This power's damage over time effect will scale with the number of stacks of Blood Frenzy. Using this power with 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy causes you to become Exhausted for a short time, but the duration of its damage over time effect is increased. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Special DoT, Recharge: Slow
Call_Hawk.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Foe -To Hit, Knockdown, -Fly
Call_Hawk.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Hawk's attack.

Feral_Charge.help: You throw yourself at your target while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and causing it to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you charge from, with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Feral Charge builds 1 stacks of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Feral_Charge.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), +3 Blood Frenzy, Self Teleport

Impale.help: You can throw a small cluster of large Thorns at a targeted foe. These Thorns carry a large amount of the toxin. In addition to dealing Toxic damage, a successful attack can slow a target, preventing Running, Jumping or Flying. Most foes will likely be completely Immobilized, unable to run. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Impale.targetHelp: You are poisoned! Your Running speed is reduced and you may be immobilized and unable to run, jump or fly.

Thorntrops.help: You fling dozens of Thorns into the ground at a targeted location. The small Thorns pepper the ground over a large area. Any enemy that pass over the Thorntrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Thorntrops.targetHelp: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Ripper.help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc directly in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
